I wrote this when I was at a spa & it's still relevant & I think it's time for another spa trip obviously 💅🏾 https://t.co/5CsznS61bX
I wrote this in September last year - still relevant though. Blog post on subconscious beliefs 🌸 https://t.co/lQfjEw912T
Today I shall be posting some of my older pieces of writing, partly because I've grown so much & its just like wow ! Go Sabrina *dances*
This Weeks Blog Post On Boundaries & Why We Need Them 🌸- Happy Reading 📖 https://t.co/GkDchgnGI0
I am truly grateful for my friends & the friends en route & the friends who passed through briefly 🌺
I got so tearful, & I'm honestly so grateful that I'm not hiding any parts of myself because I've connected with the most beautiful souls 💜
Is ever shameful. My friend sent me the nicest message today and she said Sabrina you are a beautiful person don't let pride hide that
Touch with your honesty. Don't hide parts of yourself In shame. There's nothing shameful about your existence ever. No part of your journey
Speaking about my own trials has helped to connect me with some of the most amazing people. Open up because you never know just who you may
For once in my life I'm not worried about 'getting there' whatever that means. My present right now is beautiful so I no longer rush it 🌺
However I'd truly encourage people to stop for a minute & just really embrace yourselves & tell yourself you love yourself 🌸
I know when you're on this self development inner healing journey you don't give yourself enough credit till you get 'there'
Was talking about my childhood & the trauma. Now it's so amazing to be in a place where it's no longer crippling or suffocating
I'm just taking a minute right now to celebrate, Me, Sabrina 💜🌸 because I deserve my own recognition. The 1 thing I used to avoid actually
For me to even make my writing public like my pinned tweet ☝🏾 is truly a reflection of how far I've come & how much more is possible.
Being honest & being transparent is such a beautiful thing. I'm so glad I have been open about my past struggles. I embrace vulnerability
The glorious feeling of knowing I'm not setting an alarm clock for the next three weeks 😎 - Early wake up calls on pause 🖐🏾
February: I Declare Is A Month Filled With Endless Financial Abundance, That Is Received / Allowed With Ease. So It Is. 🌸
February - I declare every single day to be overspilling with love, romance, joyful unions, surprise flowers & sacred ❤️. So it is. 🌺🌹
@_YasElizabeth starch 😂
@KJansons I'm glad it was right on time for you sweetheart ! Embrace the state of ease and allow. Lots of love to you x
Now more than ever it is important to have balance. Less action. This is more of being present situation than forceful action
You've released your stubbornness and have accepted your way isn't the best way. Ease. The path of ease is.
You've stepped into a new chapter of life & this chapter you cannot bring with you the old ways / habits. Embrace the current serenity 🌷
Feminine has released the need to control, obsess & worry over outcomes because she knows everything works out always & is accepting of this
@Mrs_Thomas2 Thankyou my beloved friend ! Can't wait to see you next week 😁 😘
New beginnings are unfolding and it's so exciting. You're new relaxed approach to life is benefiting you greatly 🌸
I truly believe this month of Feb is the month life changing events take place ( positive). Feminine right now there's an essence of calm 💆🏾
February is a HUGE month for feminine truly.
Become that which you desire.
🌸 New Month - use this time to reflect on January what's worked, what's not worked & focus on your intentions 🌸
👇🏾🌸 Following on from my earlier tweets https://t.co/HlxAK0D12e
@SminitheSupreme absolutely! Congratulations I see you're a doula as well which will add positivity to your birthing experience 🌸
@SminitheSupreme I'm right there with you all of my reproductive organs are in optimal health always and so it is 🌸
Life is difficult / struggle & instead replace it with I have everything I need at all times, good things come to me always. It's a decision
Things I desired appeared all the time. It's not just about receiving it's mainly about allowing. Are you willing to give up the belief that
I paid less attention to what I didn't like & begun to write down and speak things into existence & lo & behold it worked. Life was easier
I could not afford to speak ill of myself or others & block my blessings. I gave up grudges, resentment & bitterness & focused intentionally
I had no 💡 until then the power of what comes out of our mouths literally creates our lives. Once I started to notice changes I realised
The tongue is mighty powerful speak blessings onto your life always. Since I started using affirmations in 2014 my life ✈️
@Raquel_Savage 😂😂😂😂😂 you've finished me
@MysticxLipstick NOW all I need to do is try and get a reading with you! 😂 I always miss it because of the time difference in London
The power of affirmations 💥💥💥💥

In the space of a few days I've been invited on two road trips @MysticxLipstick I can't lie I was like 😳 infinitely… https://t.co/6s392Q9Ydj
@DropsofDestiny wanna know what I've realised Hun, you gotta make wherever you're at ok. The need for 'more' must go.
This weeks thoughts on feminine 🌸 https://t.co/wu1At907Rt
This weeks thoughts on feminine and masculine 🌸💜📝 https://t.co/DnKBfVP0sV
@DropsofDestiny it's the truth. Take it from a recovered control freak 😂
Allow life to be easy. 📝
I literally don't even have the energy to 'make things happen' anymore. If it is meant to be the universe knows the easiest way to bring it.
Path of ease & relaxation feels better and is much better. Release your anxieties about timeframes & everything manifests easier.
Is over exertion rooted in fear, lack of faith & self sabotaging. Working harder doesn't speed up manifestations.
I've learned you don't have to work hard at all & yes that's radical, but more effort doesn't = better or faster outcomes if that effort
That overly controlling, anxious, obsessive character is unnecessary. Learn to allow things to be easy for you.
Things isn't the most effective, but because that's all you've ever done you think it's the only way to gain results ?
We get into this habit of really forcing things to be a certain way when it really doesn't have to be. What if the way you've been doing
'Work hard' a term preached to me since I could talk. However you can work with ease & actually be more productive & reap better results 🌸
I think society definitely drums into our head that everything has to be so hard or unobtainable. However that's BS. Things can be easy 🌸
Release the need to worry declare it out loud & observe what happens. Suddenly there are no more obstacles & things flow with ease.
@thedejaspeaks awwww thankyou as are you 💜🌸
Universe doesn't actually require too much of your input if at all for things to work out 🌸
Things can work out without worry or obsessive control. Don't block your manifestations 🌸
Guess I needed to remind myself 🌸 https://t.co/t95U3yCqnV
I am celebrated, loved, adored & supported by my lover always in all ways #MyVisionManifested

There is not a single reason / justification in the past that prevents me from being happy in the now 🌸

Gratitude, give thanks for where you're at right now.
